Class MasterController

java.lang.Object
MasterController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscriber
public class MasterController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscriber
Class handling communication between SimulationDialog and Master

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MasterController​(Master master, SimulationDialog dialog, StatsDrawer statsDrawer, ExtractDrawer extractDrawer, ContagionParameters parameters)
    Master controller constructor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void extractChanged()
    Updates requested extract area in master and if round is not currently running renews the extract straight away.
    void makeStep()
    Executes a single round of simulation on the master
    void onComplete()  
    void onError​(java.lang.Throwable throwable)  
    void onNext​(java.lang.Object item)  
    void onSubscribe​(java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscription subscription)  
    void setAutoplay​(boolean play)
    Sets flag indicating whether rounds should be executed automatically.
    void setAutoplayDelay​(long milliseconds)
    Updates delay between rounds when autoplay is on to passed value of milliseconds.
    void updateComponents​(Stats stats)
    Updates components reflecting the simulation.
    void updateContagionParameters​(ContagionParameters parameters)
    Updates active contagion parameters and sets flag to update it in simulators before executing next round.
    void windowClosed()
    Handles ending the simulation when user closes the simulation window.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • MasterController

      public MasterController​(Master master, SimulationDialog dialog, StatsDrawer statsDrawer, ExtractDrawer extractDrawer, ContagionParameters parameters)
      Master controller constructor.
      Parameters:
      master - master that runs the simulation.
      dialog - frame that displays the simulation.
      statsDrawer - Component that draws the stat-chart.
      extractDrawer - Component that draws the graphical representation of extract.
      parameters - Initially active contagion parameters.

  • Method Details

    • makeStep

      public void makeStep()
      Executes a single round of simulation on the master

    • updateContagionParameters

      public void updateContagionParameters​(ContagionParameters parameters)
      Updates active contagion parameters and sets flag to update it in simulators before executing next round.
      Parameters:
      parameters - new contagion parameters.

    • setAutoplayDelay

      public void setAutoplayDelay​(long milliseconds)
      Updates delay between rounds when autoplay is on to passed value of milliseconds. If the round takes longer than the delay to execute the rounds will be executed as soon as the previous ends.
      Parameters:
      milliseconds - time in milliseconds to wait between executing two rounds.

    • setAutoplay

      public void setAutoplay​(boolean play)
      Sets flag indicating whether rounds should be executed automatically.
      Parameters:
      play - true if next round should be executed after current round ends, false otherwise.

    • extractChanged

      public void extractChanged()
      Updates requested extract area in master and if round is not currently running renews the extract straight away.

    • windowClosed

      public void windowClosed()
      Handles ending the simulation when user closes the simulation window.

    • updateComponents

      public void updateComponents​(Stats stats)
      Updates components reflecting the simulation. (Stats labels, stats chart, extract panel)
      Parameters:
      stats - latest rounds stats to update the components with.

    • onSubscribe

      public void onSubscribe​(java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscription subscription)
      Specified by:
      onSubscribe in interface java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscriber

    • onNext

      public void onNext​(java.lang.Object item)
      Specified by:
      onNext in interface java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscriber

    • onError

      public void onError​(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
      Specified by:
      onError in interface java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscriber

    • onComplete

      public void onComplete()
      Specified by:
      onComplete in interface java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscriber
